pr_title: JBPM-9151 API return 200 if containerId does not exist

timeline.message:
JBPM-9151 API return 200 if containerId does not exist

Check if deployment id is available in the in memory list and throw
proper exception if not.

replies.bodyText: This change was suggested by Gonzalo. The target is to keep client units array consistent with the server.
